statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM user_activity WHERE interaction_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, interacted_user_id FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, interacted_user_id FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'like' AND interacted_user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activity_type, activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date, activity_type, activity_date FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, activity_type FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_date FROM users u INNER JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, a.activity_type FROM users u JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_date >= '2021-05-01';

SELECT u.username, i.interaction_type, f.username as friend_username FROM users u JOIN user_interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN users f ON i.friend_id = f.user_id ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_id) as total_users, COUNT(DISTINCT i.interaction_id) as total_interactions FROM users u JOIN user_interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT users.username, posts.post_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE users.age > 25;
SELECT user1_id, user2_id, friendship_date FROM friends ORDER BY friendship_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM activities WHERE user_id = '1234' AND activity_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_friends FROM friends WHERE user_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Post' AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, content.content_title, content.content_description FROM users JOIN content ON users.user_id = content.user_id WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT interactions.user_id, friends.friend_id, interactions.interaction_type FROM interactions INNER JOIN friends ON interactions.user_id = friends.user_id;
